summary:
- **Capital Raising Completion**: Placement of 97,009,898 shares at $0.004/share, raising ~$388k (shortfall from prior $1M Rights Issue).  
- **Cleansing Notice**: Shares issued under Section 708A(5)(e) without Part 6D.2 disclosure; confirms compliance with continuous disclosure obligations.  

(Note: Shortfall amount inferred from share count × issue price; primary $1M raise was disclosed earlier on 27 June.)
